comments:
According to the syntax of the update-policy xml file(http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/platform-update-home/doc/working/update-policy.html) the url attribute of the url-map tag could be empty.
This however causes NPE when trying to open "Find and Install" dialog and the dialog is not opened.
